name: A Doge's Tale
description:
So this is our final project for Dogecoin Game Jam. Hope you like our work.

This was our first game jam and basically  one of our completed games (needs a lot of work still). Thank you for this wonderful game jam everyone! Good luck and remember, Do Only Good Everyday! 

Jumping is a little hard right now. Try to jump and move if you having difficulty!

  • Twitter of our studio - https://twitter.com/entroplay
  • Reddit of our studio - https://www.reddit.com/r/Entroplay/
  • Twitter of our Voice actor - https://twitter.com/ImpliedLies

You can support us with doge - DEfBhgizocvcBhtCwfobEXQAwYT1sad2eo
